website_summaries.verdict: An affordable upgrade from battery-powered fans with no misting ability. Evaporative cooling will bring down the air temperature a few degrees getting the user too wet.
pros: Includes water refill bottle for outdoor use
cons: Some disappointment with overall cooling power
Mister can stop working at certain angles

customer_reviews.title: Works great! My roommate loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My roommate loves it!!!! I got another similar brand for myself! Insten is what I got! His motor seems to work better...! But I put a magic touch on mine that makes mine work just as well I think! But, yeah! EMDMAK works great! Mister doesn't last long like other reviewers have noted... But it lasts long enough for a small joyful period...! Like at the pool or just coming back from a hot environment or stress fueled day! Hope that review helps!
customer_reviews.author: Beliala Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I love the misting feature and the fact that the fan stays charged so long. It does have good power. I purchased it for an outdoor birthday party in the middle of July. The fan didn't do so well. It blew air. But it wasn't cool and it didn't help at all in cooling me down. I'll continue to use it, but it didn't work for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a week later
customer_reviews.text: Was the best thing ever for like a week, then the sprayer started to not work well and then the lights stopped working. It’s a great little product, but it’s not built well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner
customer_reviews.text: I used this during our camping trip 10 miles from the sun and I think it saved my life. I'm 6' 6" 330lbs and heat is not my friend.. Lasted all day long and into the next. It kept me cool and everyone wanted to see it.. Winner winner
customer_reviews.author: Lance Jettie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I've tried so many portable fans and this one is the best by far!! I just ordered another one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for moving air around on a hot humid day.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cato

customer_reviews.title: Feels like air conditioning. Great for late in pregnancy when you're overheating.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The battery lasts a long time in my opinion. The water reservoir is fairly small, but I use it sparingly, so I am able to make it last. With the mister going at the same time as the fan, it feels like an air conditioner! I used this in Tennessee in the hottest days on July while on vacation and while 6 months pregnant. I also use it at work (without the mister) to help when I overheat (I'm now 8 months pregnant and getting hotter). I love that I don't need batteries - I just plug it into my computer to charge! It doesn't get any better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan but water doesn't spray out.
customer_reviews.text: Fan works well. Rechargeable so no batteries. Charge lasts a long time. Water feature doesn't work hardly at all. I thought it would spray more mist out buy barely any water comes out the mister. Nice fam though for hot days or hot flushes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby it's hot outside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a hurricane supply but found myself using it whenever we go to the parks. Anyone who lives in Florida knows how it gets so hot you have sweat in top of sweatthsnkd to this little fan my face was saved from some of that awful torture! I have recommended this to friends and they have quickly gone and bought this and have enjoyed the same face cooking happiness I have!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3masterofnone

customer_reviews.title: Wind In Your Hair, Freshing Mist On Your Face!
customer_reviews.text: Peppy little hand-held fan with misting ability. Only down side is that is kinda heavy to hold for a long time. Happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney World!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a disney world trip. It was great for the first 2 days but then I noticed it wasn't on the side of my back pack. I can only assume it fell out on one of the 100 rides we went on. I hope someone found it that needed it more than we did.
customer_reviews.author: hobbyflier

customer_reviews.title: This product is great!
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is amazing. It is like having your own personal A/C unit. I have been using it for camping and it was very effective at providing some nice, cool air on a hot summer day.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Two speed fan, fully functional water mister. No Leaks. And yes, it's very cool.
customer_reviews.text: The mister, ...you can control on/off, is awesome. No leaks...at all. Can't wait for summer.
customer_reviews.author: David 54

customer_reviews.title: ... wish the water reservoir was bigger but it works great. One of the plastic pieces encasing the fan ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish the water reservoir was bigger but it works great. One of the plastic pieces encasing the fan broke off already though. WIsh it was sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Park

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product does cool you down a bit in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product does cool you down a bit in a hot temperature setting. You do have to hold it with your hands and put it close to your face, but that's why God gave you 2 hands and 1 brain.
customer_reviews.author: CHYNAMAN Music

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, decent air flow. Water spray stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Water spray stopped working in 2 months, battery and fan works perfectly but the water sprout feature no longer works
customer_reviews.author: Zabdiel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: BEST FAN EVER!
customer_reviews.text: BEST FAN EVER! I bought this for universal studios and disney world in florida and it was glorious!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kim
